mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.resident_id AS "resident.id", a.business_id AS "businessId", a.goods_id AS "goods.id", a.code AS "code", a.numbers AS "numbers", a.units AS "units", a.status AS "status", a.com_status AS "comStatus", a.belong_org_id AS "belongOrg.id", a.belong_area_id AS "belongArea", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", g.full_name AS "goods.fullName", o.name AS "belongOrg.name", g.images_id AS 'goods.imagesId', r.name AS "resident.name", r.telphone AS "resident.telphone", r.building_no AS "resident.buildingNo"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.belong_org_id LEFT JOIN sc_goods g ON g.id = a.goods_id LEFT JOIN sc_resident r ON r.id = a.resident_id
mapper.select:

FROM sc_orders a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sc_orders( id, resident_id, business_id, goods_id, code, numbers, units, status, com_status, belong_org_id, belong_area_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{resident.id}, #{businessId}, #{goods.id}, #{code}, #{numbers}, #{units}, #{status}, #{comStatus}, #{belongOrg.id}, #{belongArea}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
